title: 如何生成世界时，不生成生物
author: yuan3344520

replies.author: xiaovo
replies.txt_content: /gamerule doMobSpawning false望采纳/gamerule doMobSpawning true是开启

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: SQwatermark
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule doMobSpawning false
禁止生物自然生成（但不影响刷怪箱，刷怪箱不刷怪大概得开和平）

replies.author: xiaopangju
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule doMobSpawning false
任何生物无法生成，但是自己拿刷怪蛋或者刷怪笼会刷，如果只需要不要怪物，开和平就可以

replies.author: yuan3344520
replies.txt_content: 都确定是所有的敌对生物和有好生物都不刷
